sentences.en: ‘Did you see Simon today?’ ‘Of course,’ Nathalie replied with a smile.
sentences.cn: “你今天见到西蒙了吗？”“当然啦。”纳萨莉笑着答道。

sentences.en: "The matter is closed," was the curt reply.
sentences.cn: 得到的答复简短而无礼：“事情已经结束了。”

sentences.en: "Well, dear," her hostess would reply with a frigid smile.
sentences.cn: “噢，亲爱的，”她的女主人会笑容僵硬地回答。

sentences.en: "Yes," he muttered, his voice so muted I hardly heard his reply.
sentences.cn: 他小声说：“是。”声音低得我几乎听不到。

sentences.en: Grace was too terrified to reply.
sentences.cn: 格雷斯吓坏了，不能作答。

sentences.en: He began to sputter his reply.
sentences.cn: 他开始结结巴巴地回答。

sentences.en: He said in reply that the question was unfair.
sentences.cn: 他回答说这个问题不公平。

sentences.en: Her reply was unprintable.
sentences.cn: 她的回答实在难以启齿。

sentences.en: I asked Clive where he was going, but he didn’t reply.
sentences.cn: 我问克莱夫到哪儿去，但他没有回答。

sentences.en: I called out a challenge, but there was no reply.
sentences.cn: 我提出挑战，但是没人回应。

sentences.en: I have received neither an acknowledgment nor a reply.
sentences.cn: 我未收到任何复函或答复。

sentences.en: I tried calling, but there was no reply.
sentences.cn: 我试着打电话去，但没有人接。

sentences.en: Major's reply came as a complete surprise to the House of Commons.
sentences.cn: 梅杰的回答让众议院大吃一惊。

sentences.en: My friend's reply was courteous but firm.
sentences.cn: 我朋友的回答很客气，但很坚决。

sentences.en: Sorry it took me so long to reply.
sentences.cn: 抱歉，我过了这么久才回复。

sentences.en: Stephen made no reply .
sentences.cn: 斯蒂芬没有回答。

sentences.en: They went ahead without waiting for a reply from the Germans.
sentences.cn: 他们没等德国人答复就接着往下推进。

sentences.en: We can't promise to publish a reply as space is limited.
sentences.cn: 由于版面有限，我们不能保证把回复登载出来。

sentences.en: We guarantee to reply in full within 10 working days.
sentences.cn: 我们保证在10个工作日内悉数回复。

sentences.en: Weatherby didn't deign to reply.
sentences.cn: 韦瑟比不屑回答。
